survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Meeting Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees on their satisfaction and experience with hybrid meeting tools used in the workplace, focusing on usability, effectiveness, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools do you regularly use for work?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools. Ensure the 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools do you regularly use for work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the audio and video quality of the hybrid meeting tools you use?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is balanced and covers all possible satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the audio and video quality of the hybrid meeting tools you use?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using hybrid meeting tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture common challenges. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using hybrid meeting tools?

questions.question_text: How often do technical issues disrupt your hybrid meetings?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale to measure frequency. Ensure the scale is intuitive and covers all possible frequencies.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do technical issues disrupt your hybrid meetings?

questions.question_text: What features would improve your experience with hybrid meeting tools?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with a text area for longer responses.
